object.name: view-page
object.property: Go back to public view of page.

object.name: folder_contents
object.property: Batch organize and navigate site content.

object.name: add
object.property: Add content (pages, folders, news items, and so on) in the current folder.

object.name: edit
object.property: Edit the content of this current item.

object.name: state
object.property: Manage the current publication state of this page.

object.name: design
object.property: Change the appearance of the current page and folder.

object.name: cut
object.property: Cut this file to paste it elsewhere.

object.name: copy
object.property: Copy or Move this item.

object.name: paste
object.property: Paste a file that has been copied or cut.

object.name: delete
object.property: Delete or move this item to a recycle bin.

object.name: rename
object.property: Rename this item.

object.name: sharing
object.property: Grant permissions on the current item to other users or groups of users. The permissions you can grant are for editing, viewing, or reviewing the current item for publication, and for being able to add more items to the current folder.

object.name: history
object.property: View edit and workflow state history of this page.

object.name: rules
object.property: Shows the version history of the current item: who created or edited it, when, and what they did, including version comparisons and the ability to revert to a particular version.

object.name: aliases
object.property: View and update all urls that redirect to this page.

object.name: syndication
object.property: Control how you publish your content with RSS/Atom/iTunes.

object.name: analytics
object.property: Review analytic statistics for this page.

object.name: preview
object.property: Preview this page in different browser sizes.

object.name: invalidate
object.property: Clear proxy servers and/or cloudflare cache.

object.name: slots
object.property: Manage content in parts of the page from the Theme.

object.name: dashboard
object.property: View and manage your dashboard.

object.name: preferences
object.property: Your personal settings.

object.name: activity_log
object.property: A list of everything you did on the site.

object.name: logout
object.property: Log out of the site.

object.name: site_setup
object.property: Configuration area for Castle and add-on Products.

object.name: impersonate
object.property: View the page as another user.

object.name: recycle
object.property: Recover deleted items from the recycle bin.

object.name: review
object.property: Review content that will be archived to static storage.

object.name: tour
object.property: Launches the CastleCMS tour.
